titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to allow emergency haying under the conservation reserve program during the primary nesting season.
Conservation Reserve Program Flexibility Act of 2021
Conservation Reserve Program Flexibility Act of 2021
CRP Flexibility Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary:
Conservation Reserve Program Flexibility Act of 2021 or CRP Flexibility Act of 2021
This bill modifies the Conservation Reserve Program (CRP) to permit emergency haying during the primary nesting season to respond to drought or other emergencies. (Under current law, emergency haying is only permitted outside of the primary nesting season.)
Under CRP, the Department of Agriculture provides annual payments to agricultural producers to take highly erodible and environmentally sensitive land out of production and install resource-conserving practices.
